CustomField.formula: IF( Total_Resource_Capacity_Hours__c - Capacity_in_Hours__c < 0, IMAGE("/img/samples/flag_red.gif", "red", 30, 30), IF( Total_Resource_Capacity_Hours__c - Capacity_in_Hours__c = 0, IMAGE("/img/samples/flag_yellow.gif", "yellow", 30, 30), IMAGE("/img/samples/flag_green.gif", "green", 30, 30) ) )
CustomField.label: Capacity Status
